summary.span: 提供与当前应用程序相关的属性、方法和事件。

span.span: Provides properties, methods, and events related to the current application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开的属性`My.Application`对象仅与当前应用程序或 DLL 相关联的返回数据。The properties exposed by the `My.Application` object return data that is associated only with the current application or DLL. 无法使用 `My.Application` 更改任何系统级信息。No system-level information can be altered with `My.Application`. `My.Application` 对象由以下类组成：The `My.Application` object consists of the following classes: - 提供了所有项目中的可用成员。 provides members that are available in all projects. - 提供了可在 Windows 窗体应用程序中的成员。 provides members that are available in Windows Forms applications. - 提供了可在控制台应用程序中的成员。 provides members that are available in console applications. ## Examples 此示例使用一个循环来循环访问应用程序的打开的窗体，选择当前线程，可以直接访问窗体并显示在其标题控件。This example uses a loop to iterate through the application's open forms, selects the forms that can be accessed directly by the current thread, and displays their titles in a control. 有关如何访问打开的窗体的信息，请参阅。For information about how to access the open forms, see . [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#10)] 此示例要求在 Windows 窗体应用程序具有名为窗体`Form1`，其中包含一个名为列表框`ListBox1`。This example requires that your Windows Forms application have a form named `Form1` that contains a list box named `ListBox1`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void DoEvents() cil managed

summary.span: 处理当前在消息队列中的所有 Windows 消息。

span.span: Processes all Windows messages currently in the message queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.DoEvents`方法使应用程序能够处理代码运行时，可能会引发其他事件。The `My.Application.DoEvents` method allows your application to handle other events that might be raised while you code runs. `My.Application.DoEvents`方法具有相同的行为方法。The `My.Application.DoEvents` method has the same behavior as the method. 在运行 Windows 窗体应用程序时，它会创建新窗体，然后等待要处理的事件。When you run a Windows Forms application, it creates a new form, which then waits for events to be handled. 每次窗体处理的事件，如按钮单击，它处理与该事件关联的所有代码。Each time the form handles an event, such as a button click, it processes all the code associated with that event. 在队列中等待所有其他事件。All other events wait in the queue. 虽然你的代码处理事件时，你的应用程序不响应。While your code handles the event, your application does not respond. 例如，如果另一个窗口拖到顶部，也无法重新绘制窗口。For example, the window does not repaint if another window is dragged on top. 如果调用`My.Application.DoEvents`在代码中，你的应用程序可以处理其他事件。If you call `My.Application.DoEvents` in your code, your application can handle the other events. 例如，如果你的代码添加到数据在循环中，并且它将调用的循环的每个步骤后`My.Application.DoEvents`，通过它拖动到另一个窗口时，可重新绘制窗体。For example, if your code adds data to a in a loop, and after each step of the loop it calls `My.Application.DoEvents`, your form repaints when another window is dragged over it. 如果你删除`My.Application.DoEvents`在代码中，你的窗体不会重新绘制按钮的单击事件处理程序完成之前执行。If you remove `My.Application.DoEvents` from your code, your form will not repaint until the click event handler of the button is finished executing. 通常情况下，在处理消息循环中使用此方法。Typically, you use this method in a loop to process messages. > [!NOTE] > `My.Application.DoEvents`窗体一样方法不会完全相同的方式处理事件。The `My.Application.DoEvents` method does not process events in exactly the same way as the form does. 使用多线程处理将窗体直接处理事件。Use multithreading to make the form directly handle the events. 有关详细信息，请参阅[多线程应用程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a06a1a56-dd16-44e8-bc01-2c2255511bc6)。For more information, see [Multithreaded Applications](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a06a1a56-dd16-44e8-bc01-2c2255511bc6). > [!CAUTION] > 如果处理用户界面 (UI) 事件的方法调用`My.Application.DoEvents`方法，该方法之前，可能需要重新输入其完成。If a method that handles a user interface (UI) event calls the `My.Application.DoEvents` method, the method might be re-entered before it finishes. 这可以因为`My.Application.DoEvents`方法处理 Windows 消息和 Windows 消息可以引发事件。This can happen because the `My.Application.DoEvents` method processes Windows messages, and Windows messages can raise events. 下表列出的任务涉及示例`My.Application.DoEvents`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Application.DoEvents` method. |到To|查看See| |-|-| |允许窗体输入，而繁忙的 UI 响应Allow a form to respond to UI input while busy|[演练：处理事件Walkthrough: Handling Events](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/events/walkthrough-handling-events.md)| ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|否No| |控制台应用程序Console Application|否No| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|否No| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.DoEvents`方法，以允许的 UI`TextBox1`更新。This example uses the `My.Application.DoEvents` method to allow the UI for `TextBox1` to update. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#6)] 此代码应在窗体具有`TextBox1`组件与`Text`属性。This code should be in a form that has a `TextBox1` component with a `Text` property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`MainForm`属性来获取或设置Visual Basic 应用程序启动/关闭模型将用作应用程序的主窗体的对象。Use the `MainForm` property to get or set the object that the Visual Basic Application Startup/Shutdown model uses as the application's main form. 此属性支持 Visual Basic 应用程序启动/关闭模型。This property supports the Visual Basic Application Startup/Shutdown model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 应用程序关闭时，不会保留对此属性的更改。The changes to this property are not persisted when the application closes. 若要永久更改主窗体，必须更改中的设置**项目设计器**。To change the main form permanently, you must change the setting in the **Project Designer**.

summary.span: 确定初始屏幕的最小显示时间长度（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Determines the minimum length of time, in milliseconds, for which the splash screen is displayed.

value.span: 初始屏幕的最小显示时间长度（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The minimum length of time, in milliseconds, for which the splash screen is displayed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime`属性可以指定想要显示的应用程序的初始屏幕的时间的最小长度。The `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property allows you to specify the minimum length of time you want the application's splash screen to be displayed. 如果主窗体完成后在更短的时间比所指定的此属性中初始化前所需的时间的推移，此时将显示主窗体, 仍保持在初始屏幕。If the main form finishes initializing in less time than what is specified by this property, the splash screen remains until the requested amount of time passes, at which time the main form is displayed. 如果你的应用程序花费的时间启动，初始屏幕关闭后主窗体变为活动状态。If your application takes longer to start, the splash screen is closed once the main form becomes active. 当你将初始屏幕添加到应用程序中使用项目设计器时，它会设置`My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime`属性设置为 2000，从而指定最小显示时间为两秒。When you add a splash screen to your application using the Project Designer, it sets the `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property to 2000, giving a minimum display time of two seconds. 此属性支持 Visual Basic 应用程序模型。This property supports the Visual Basic Application model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 应设置`My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime`重写的方法中的属性或方法。You should set the `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property in a method that overrides the or method. 重写的方法的代码类应在 ApplicationEvents.vb 文件中，默认情况下隐藏输入。Code that overrides methods of the class should be entered in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |若要访问代码编辑器窗口，重写成员To access the Code Editor window for overriding members| |1.在选择了项目**解决方案资源管理器**，单击**属性**上**项目**菜单。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2.单击“应用程序” 选项卡。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3.单击“查看应用程序事件” 按钮，打开“代码编辑器”。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.

有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).| ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|否No| |控制台应用程序Console Application|否No| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|否No| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例演示如何设置`My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime`通过重写属性属性。This example demonstrates how to set the `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property by overriding the property. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#51)] 此示例要求项目具有初始屏幕。This example requires that the project have a splash screen. 为应用程序事件，必须在代码编辑器窗口中输入此代码。You must enter this code in the Code Editor window for application events. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event NetworkAvailabilityChanged As NetworkAvailableEventHandler

summary.span: 在网络可用性更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the network availability changes.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 应用程序引发的`NetworkAvailabilityChanged`事件每次在网络可用性更改时。An application raises the `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event every time that the availability of the network changes. 可以使用属性的`e`参数，以获取新的网络连接的状态。You can use the property of the `e` parameter to get the new state of the network connection. 若要获取的网络连接的当前状态，请使用属性。To get the current state of the network connection, use the property. 与其他用户界面事件的应用程序的主线程上引发此事件。This event is raised on the application's main thread with the other user-interface events. 这使事件处理程序，可以直接访问应用程序的 UI。This enables the event handler to access directly the application's UI. 但是，如果应用程序正忙于处理另一个用户界面事件时将引发此事件，此事件之前，无法处理其他事件处理程序完成，或调用方法。However, if the application is busy handling another user-interface event when this event is raised, this event cannot be processed until the other event handler finishes or calls the method. 事件提供相同的功能，因为此事件但适用于所有应用程序类型。The event provides the same functionality as this event but is available for all application types. 有关代码`NetworkAvailabilityChanged`事件处理程序存储在默认情况下隐藏的 ApplicationEvents.vb 文件。The code for the `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |若要访问的应用程序事件的代码编辑器窗口To access the Code Editor window for application events| |1.在中选择一个项目**解决方案资源管理器。**1. Have a project selected in **Solution Explorer.** 单击**属性**上**项目**菜单。Click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2.单击“应用程序” 选项卡。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3.单击“查看应用程序事件” 按钮，打开“代码编辑器”。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.

有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).| > [!NOTE] > 许多网络中心将提供网络连接，即使较大的网络断开连接的中心。Many network hubs will provide a network connection even if the hub is disconnected from a larger network. 因此，对于有线连接，此事件指示计算机和中心之间的连接中的更改。Consequently, for wired connections, this event indicates change in the connection between the computer and a hub. > [!NOTE] > `NetworkAvailabilityChanged`应用程序在 Windows 95 和 Windows 98 上运行时或通过非管理员身份在 Windows 2000 上运行时则不引发事件。The `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event is not raised by applications when they are run on Windows 95 and Windows 98, or when they are run by a non-administrator on Windows 2000. 如果你的应用程序可能会运行这些操作系统上，使用属性来检查网络可用性。If your application might run on those operating systems, use the property to check for network availability. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|否No| |控制台应用程序Console Application|否No| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|否No| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例调用`SetConnectionStatus`方法的默认`Form1`类网络可用性更改时。This example calls the `SetConnectionStatus` method of the default `Form1` class when the network availability changes. 为应用程序事件，必须在代码编辑器窗口中输入代码。You must enter the code in the Code Editor window for application events. 若要访问此窗口，请按照本主题的备注部分中的说明。To access this window, follow the instructions from this topic's Remarks section. 此项目应具有名为窗体`Form1`。The project should have a form named `Form1`. 它应具有一个名为方法`SetConnectionStatus`采用`Boolean`参数。It should have a method named `SetConnectionStatus` that takes a `Boolean` parameter. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，它将进入 Windows 窗体消息循环之前, 此方法将调用`OnCreateMainForm`（若要创建应用程序的主窗体） 和`HideSplashScreen`（若要关闭初始屏幕） 的方法：By default, before it enters the Windows Forms message loop, this method calls the `OnCreateMainForm` (to create the application's main form) and `HideSplashScreen` (to close the splash screen) methods: - 。. 提供设计器发出初始化主窗体的代码的方法。Provides a way for a designer to emit code that initializes the main form. 默认情况下，此方法没有任何影响。By default, this method does nothing. 但是，如果选择主窗体应用程序的 Visual Basic**项目设计器**，在设计器将重写方法设置的方法与到主窗体的新实例的属性。However, when you select a main form for your application in the Visual Basic **Project Designer**, the designer overrides the method with a method that sets the property to a new instance of the main form. - 。. 如果应用程序具有定义的初始屏幕，并且它已打开，则此方法关闭初始屏幕。If the application has a splash screen defined and it is open, this method closes the splash screen. 默认情况下，此方法关闭初始屏幕。By default, this method closes the splash screen.

summary.span: 获取应用程序中所有打开的窗体的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of all the application's open forms.

value.span: 对象，包含应用程序中所有打开的窗体。

span.span: A object that contains all of the application's open forms.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.OpenForms`属性获取的应用程序的所有打开的窗体的集合。The `My.Application.OpenForms` property gets a collection of all the application's open forms. 行为等同于属性。The behavior is identical to the property. > [!NOTE] > `My.Application.OpenForms`属性将返回所有打开的窗体，而不考虑由哪个线程打开它们。The `My.Application.OpenForms` property returns all open forms, regardless of which thread opened them. 应检查属性的每个窗体，然后才能访问它; 否则，它可能会引发异常。You should check the property of each form before accessing it; otherwise, it might throw an exception. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|否No| |控制台应用程序Console Application|否No| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|否No| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例循环访问应用程序的打开的窗体，由当前线程中，选择可直接访问并显示其标题中的控件。This example loops over the application's open forms, selects the ones directly accessible by the current thread, and displays their titles in a control. 此示例要求在 Windows 窗体应用程序具有名为窗体`Form1`，其中包含一个名为列表框`ListBox1`。This example requires that your Windows Forms application have a form named `Form1` that contains a list box named `ListBox1`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#10)] 此示例循环访问应用程序的打开的窗体，并显示在其标题控件。This example loops over the application's open forms and displays their titles in a control. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#11)]

summary.span: 确定应用程序在退出时是否保存用户设置。

span.span: Determines whether the application saves the user settings on exit.

value.span: 指明应用程序在退出时保存用户设置。

span.span: indicates that the application saves the user settings on exit.

value.span: 否则，将不会以隐含方式保存设置。

span.span: Otherwise, the settings are not implicitly saved.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `SaveMySettingsOnExit`属性允许用户更改应用程序如何将设置保存在运行时。The `SaveMySettingsOnExit` property allows the user to change how the application saves settings, at run time. 您可以通过使用显式保存设置更改方法的`My.Settings`对象。You can explicitly save setting changes by using the method of the `My.Settings` object. 有关更改和保存设置的详细信息，请参阅[应用程序属性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0ad4926f-636e-41f8-a5b1-faf9d9b0a254)。For more information about changing and saving settings, see [Application Properties](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0ad4926f-636e-41f8-a5b1-faf9d9b0a254). 应用程序关闭时，不会保留对此属性的更改。The changes to this property are not persisted when the application closes. 若要更改`SaveMySettingsOnExit`属性永久，则必须更改中的设置**项目设计器**:To change the `SaveMySettingsOnExit` property permanently, you must change the setting in the **Project Designer**: | | |-| |若要更改项目设计器中的设置To change the setting in the Project Designer| |1.在 **“解决方案资源管理器”** 中选择一个项目。1. Have a project selected in **Solution Explorer**. 单击**属性**上**项目**菜单。Click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2.单击“应用程序” 选项卡。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3.选择**关闭时保存 My.Settings**。3. Select **Save My.Settings on Shutdown**.| ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|否No| |控制台应用程序Console Application|否No| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|否No| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例分为两部分。This example has two parts. - `InitializeSaveMySettingsOnExit`初始化的选中的状态的子例程控件的当前值与`SaveMySettingsOnExit`属性。The `InitializeSaveMySettingsOnExit` subroutine, which initializes the checked state of a control to the current value of the `SaveMySettingsOnExit` property. - `SaveMySettingsOnExit_CheckedChanged`处理更改的子例程控件，以更新`My.Application.SaveMySettingsOnExit`属性。The `SaveMySettingsOnExit_CheckedChanged` subroutine, which handles changes to a control to update the `My.Application.SaveMySettingsOnExit` property. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#12)] 此示例正常工作，应用程序必须具有名为控件`SaveMySettingsOnExit`。For this example to work, your application must have a control named `SaveMySettingsOnExit`.

summary.span: 在应用程序关闭时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the application shuts down.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 应用程序引发的`Shutdown`事件，然后退出。An application raises the `Shutdown` event before it exits. 这样，您可以控制如何在应用程序关闭其资源。This allows you to control how the application closes its resources. 此事件是 Visual Basic 应用程序模型的一部分。This event is part of the Visual Basic Application model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 有关代码`Shutdown`事件处理程序存储在默认情况下隐藏的 ApplicationEvents.vb 文件。The code for the `Shutdown` event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |若要访问的应用程序事件的代码编辑器窗口To access the Code Editor window for application events| |1.在选择了项目**解决方案资源管理器**，单击**属性**上**项目**菜单。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2.单击“应用程序” 选项卡。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3.单击“查看应用程序事件” 按钮，打开“代码编辑器”。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.

有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).| ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|否No| |控制台应用程序Console Application|否No| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|否No| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例应用程序关闭时记录消息。This example logs messages when the application shuts down. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#13)] 为应用程序事件，必须在代码编辑器窗口中输入代码。You must enter the code in the Code Editor window for application events. 若要访问此窗口，请按照本主题的备注部分中的说明。To access this window, follow the instructions from this topic's Remarks section. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 日志消息时应用程序启动或关闭，请按照下](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-messages-when-the-application-starts-or-shuts-down.md)。For more information, see [How to: Log Messages When the Application Starts or Shuts Down](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-messages-when-the-application-starts-or-shuts-down.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.SplashScreen`属性可以获取或设置对象，该应用程序将用作初始屏幕，显示，而所启动的应用程序的第一个图形窗体。The `My.Application.SplashScreen` property allows you to get or set the object that the application uses as the splash screen, the first graphic form that is displayed while an application is being started. 此属性支持 Visual Basic 应用程序模型。This property supports the Visual Basic Application model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 应用程序关闭时，不会保留对此属性的更改。The changes to this property are not persisted when the application closes. 若要永久更改初始屏幕，必须更改中的设置**项目设计器**。To change the splash screen permanently, you must change the setting in the **Project Designer**. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|否No| |控制台应用程序Console Application|否No| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|否No| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.SplashScreen`属性和`My.Application.Startup`事件来更新初始屏幕的状态信息，如应用程序启动。This example uses the `My.Application.SplashScreen` property and the `My.Application.Startup` event to update the splash screen with status information as the application starts. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#14)] 此示例需要项目有一个名为`SplashScreen1`。This example requires that the project have a splash screen named `SplashScreen1`. 初始屏幕需要有一个名为`Status`更新其用户界面。The splash screen needs to have a property named `Status` that updates its user interface. 为应用程序事件，必须在代码编辑器窗口中输入此代码。You must enter this code in the Code Editor window for application events. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).

summary.span: 在应用程序启动时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the application starts.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 正常 （非单实例） 应用程序引发`Startup`每次启动时的事件。A normal (non-single-instance) application raises the `Startup` event every time it starts. 单实例应用程序将引发`Startup`事件时开始仅当应用程序已不活动状态; 否则为它会发出`StartupNextInstance`事件。A single-instance application raises the `Startup` event when it starts only if the application is not already active; otherwise, it raises the `StartupNextInstance` event. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 此事件是 Visual Basic 应用程序模型的一部分。This event is part of the Visual Basic Application model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 可以使用属性的`e`参数来控制应用程序的启动窗体的加载。You can use the property of the `e` parameter to control the loading of an application's startup form. 当属性设置为`True`，启动窗体不会启动。When the property is set to `True`, the startup form does not start. 在这种情况下，你的代码应调用其他启动代码路径。In that case, your code should call an alternate startup code path. 可以使用的属性`e`参数或属性来访问应用程序的命令行参数。You can use the property of the `e` parameter or the property to access the application's command-line arguments. 有关代码`Startup`事件处理程序存储在默认情况下隐藏的 ApplicationEvents.vb 文件。The code for the `Startup` event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |若要访问的应用程序事件的代码编辑器窗口To access the Code Editor window for application events| |1.在选择了项目**解决方案资源管理器**，单击**属性**上**项目**菜单。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2.单击“应用程序” 选项卡。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3.单击“查看应用程序事件” 按钮，打开“代码编辑器”。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.

有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).| ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|否No| |控制台应用程序Console Application|否No| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|否No| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.SplashScreen`属性和`My.Application.Startup`事件来更新初始屏幕的状态信息，如应用程序启动。This example uses the `My.Application.SplashScreen` property and the `My.Application.Startup` event to update the splash screen with status information as the application starts. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#14)] 此示例需要项目有一个名为`SplashScreen1`。This example requires that the project have a splash screen named `SplashScreen1`. 初始屏幕需要具有名为属性`Status`更新其用户界面。The splash screen needs to have property named `Status` that updates its user interface. 为应用程序事件，必须在代码编辑器窗口中输入代码。You must enter the code in the Code Editor window for application events. 若要访问此窗口，请按照本主题的备注部分中的说明。To access this window, follow the instructions from this topic's Remarks section. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).

summary.span: 在尝试启动单实例应用程序，而该应用程序已处于活动状态时发生。

span.span: Occurs when attempting to start a single-instance application and the application is already active.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 单实例应用程序引发时您尝试重新启动该应用程序时已处于活动状态事件。A single-instance application raises the event when you attempt to restart the application when it is already active. 单实例应用程序启动时第一次，它会发出事件。When a single-instance application starts for the first time, it raises the event. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 此事件是 Visual Basic 应用程序模型的一部分。This event is part of the Visual Basic Application model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 与其他用户界面事件的应用程序的主线程上引发此事件。This event is raised on the application's main thread with the other user-interface events. 这允许直接访问应用程序的用户界面的事件处理程序。This allows the event handler to access directly the application's user interface. 但是，如果应用程序正忙于处理另一个用户界面事件时将引发此事件，此事件之前，无法处理其他事件处理程序完成，或调用方法。However, if the application is busy handling another user-interface event when this event is raised, this event cannot be processed until the other event handler finishes or calls the method. > [!NOTE] > `StartupNextInstance`仅在单实例应用程序中引发事件。The `StartupNextInstance` event is raised only in single-instance applications. 若要启用你的应用程序的单实例行为，必须检查**生成单个实例应用程序**项目设计器中的复选框。To enable single-instance behavior for your application, you must check the **Make single instance application** check box in the Project Designer. | | |-| |若要使应用程序单一实例To make an application single instance| |1.在选择了项目**解决方案资源管理器**，单击**属性**上**项目**菜单。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2.单击“应用程序” 选项卡。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3.选择**生成单个实例应用程序**复选框。3. Select the **Make single instance application** check box.| 必须使用属性的`e`参数访问的后续尝试启动单实例应用程序的参数。You must use the property of the `e` parameter to access the arguments for subsequent attempts to start a single-instance application. 属性提供了用于启动单实例应用程序的第一个实例的自变量。The property provides the arguments used to start the first instance of a single-instance application. 有关代码事件处理程序存储在默认情况下隐藏的 ApplicationEvents.vb 文件。The code for the event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |若要访问的应用程序事件的代码编辑器窗口To access the Code Editor window for application events| |1.在选择了项目**解决方案资源管理器**，单击**属性**上**项目**菜单。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2.单击“应用程序” 选项卡。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3.单击“查看应用程序事件” 按钮，打开“代码编辑器”。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.

有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).| 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Application.StartupNextInstance`事件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Application.StartupNextInstance` event. |到To|查看See| |-|-| |检查第一个应用程序实例的命令行参数Check the command-line arguments of the first application instance|| ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|是Yes| |类库Class Library|否No| |控制台应用程序Console Application|否No| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|否No| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用`e`参数的事件处理程序来检查应用程序的命令行参数。This example uses the `e` parameter of the event handler to examine the application's command-line arguments. 如果参数找到以开始`/input=`，则显示该自变量的其余部分。If an argument is found that starts with `/input=`, the rest of that argument is displayed. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#15)] 为应用程序事件，必须在代码编辑器窗口中输入代码。You must enter the code in the Code Editor window for application events. 若要访问此窗口，请按照本主题的备注部分中的说明。To access this window, follow the instructions from this topic's Remarks section. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event UnhandledException As UnhandledExceptionEventHandler

summary.span: 在应用程序遇到未经处理的异常时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the application encounters an unhandled exception.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 应用程序引发的`UnhandledException`事件时遇到未经处理的异常。An application raises the `UnhandledException` event when it encounters an unhandled exception. 此事件是 Visual Basic 应用程序模型的一部分。This event is part of the Visual Basic Application model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 可以使用属性的`e`参数访问导致此事件的未处理的异常。You can use the property of the `e` parameter to access the unhandled exception that caused this event. 可以使用属性的`e`参数来控制是否在应用程序退出。You can use the property of the `e` parameter to control whether the application exits. 默认情况下是`True`。By default, is `True`. 因此，完成后退出应用程序`UnhandledException`事件处理程序。Therefore, the application exits after completing the `UnhandledException` event handler. 将值设置为`False`在`UnhandledException`事件处理程序以保留应用程序运行，并使其返回到等待状态。You can set the value to `False` in the `UnhandledException` event handler to keep the application running, and have it return to a waiting state. 有关代码`UnhandledException`事件处理程序存储在默认情况下隐藏的 ApplicationEvents.vb 文件。The code for the `UnhandledException` event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |若要访问的应用程序事件的代码编辑器窗口To access the Code Editor window for application events| |1.在选择了项目**解决方案资源管理器**，单击**属性**上**项目**菜单。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2.单击“应用程序” 选项卡。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3.单击“查看应用程序事件” 按钮，打开“代码编辑器”。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.| 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic). > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 编译器可以防止用于调试从引发此事件，以使调试器能够处理未处理的异常生成应用程序。The Visual Basic compiler prevents applications that are built for debugging from raising this event, to enable a debugger to handle the unhandled exceptions. 这意味着，如果要通过 Visual Studio 集成开发环境调试器下运行测试应用程序在`UnhandledException`将不会调用事件处理程序。This means that if you are testing your application by running it under the Visual Studio Integrated Development Environment debugger, your `UnhandledException` event handler will not be called. 有关生成用于调试的应用程序的详细信息，请参阅[/debug (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/debug.md)。For more information about building applications for debugging, see [/debug (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/debug.md). ## 任务Tasks 下表列出了涉及的任务的示例`My.Application.UnhandledException`事件。The following table lists examples of tasks that involve the `My.Application.UnhandledException` event. |到To|查看See| |-|-| |记录未处理的异常Log unhandled exceptions|[如何：日志异常How to: Log Exceptions](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions.md)| ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|否No| |控制台应用程序Console Application|否No| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|否No| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.UnhandledException`事件记录所有未经处理的异常。This example uses the `My.Application.UnhandledException` event to log any unhandled exceptions. 为应用程序事件，必须在代码编辑器窗口中输入代码。You must enter the code in the Code Editor window for application events. 若要访问此窗口，请按照本主题的备注部分中找到的过程。To access this window, follow the procedure found in this topic's Remarks section. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic). 因为`UnhandledException`调试程序附加到应用程序时不会引发事件，则必须运行此示例在 Visual Studio 集成开发环境之外。Because the `UnhandledException` event is not raised when a debugger is attached to the application, you have to run this example outside the Visual Studio Integrated Development Environment. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#17)]

protected: static property bool UseCompatibleTextRendering { bool get(); };

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，此属性允许设计器为应用程序窗体指定默认的文本呈现引擎。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, this property allows a designer to specify the default text rendering engine for the application's forms.

value.span: 值为 指示应用程序应使用 [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)] 的默认文本呈现引擎。

span.span: A value of indicates that the application should use the default text rendering engine for [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)].

value.span: 如果该值为 ，则指示应用程序应使用 Visual Basic .NET 2002 和 Visual Basic .NET 2003 的文本呈现引擎。

span.span: A value of indicates that the application should use the text rendering engine for Visual Basic .NET 2002 and Visual Basic .NET 2003.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 默认情况下，此属性返回`False`GDI 文本呈现引擎，用于指示[!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)]用于应用程序的窗体。By default, this property returns `False` to indicate that the GDI text rendering engine for [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)] be used for the application's forms. 但是，您可以重写此属性以返回`True`并指定应用程序的窗体使用的 GDI + 文本呈现引擎，在 Visual Basic.NET 2002年和 Visual Basic.NET 2003年中使用。However, you can override this property to return `True` and specify that the application's forms use the GDI+ text rendering engine, which is used in Visual Basic .NET 2002 and Visual Basic .NET 2003. 此属性由调用构造函数。This property is called by the constructor. 重写的方法的代码类应在 ApplicationEvents.vb 文件中，默认情况下隐藏输入。Code that overrides methods of the class should be entered in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |若要访问代码编辑器窗口，重写成员To access the Code Editor window for overriding members| |1.在选择了项目**解决方案资源管理器**，单击**属性**上**项目**菜单。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2.单击“应用程序” 选项卡。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3.单击“查看应用程序事件” 按钮，打开“代码编辑器”。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.

有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).| ## Examples 此示例演示如何通过重写将 GDI + 文本呈现引擎设置为应用程序的默认呈现引擎属性。This example demonstrates how to set the GDI+ text rendering engine as the application's default rendering engine by overriding the property. ```vb Protected Overloads Shared ReadOnly Property UseCompatibleTextRendering() As Boolean Get ' Use the GDI+ text rendering engine. Return True End Get End Property ``` 为应用程序事件，必须在代码编辑器窗口中输入此代码。You must enter this code in the Code Editor window for application events. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).

span.span: Extending the Visual Basic Application Model
Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)
